Tejas Curious Mech

Movement Range: 1

archetypal gene

Mechanical

game effects

An expert engineer, Tejas heals one keal means per turn for all Mechanical, Algorithmic, or Entropic archetypal gene souls in the same territory. If Tejas does not fix anything this turn he becomes bored and breaks himself. Tejas can fix himself if he does not fix anything next turn. When broken, Tajas is downed. Tajas breaks or fixes himself at the start of the cycle.

die rolls

Always Rolls: D6-D6

keal means

Hydraulic Punch Mechanical
Pneumatic Impact Ratchet Mechanical-Avian

brawl power

Habitat

card variation

Character

Scarcity

Founder's Deck

History

Tejas is one of the many private offshoots from the SIS project. This particular mechanical marvel continuously attempts to improve his own chassis. 'Bigger sprockets here, lighter rod there, auxiliary power in case of failure all around' he says. Inspite or because of his categorical engineering knowledge, he often stumps himself and runs around in pieces for days, even sometimes weeks!
